overview.title: Overview
overview.welcome: Welcome to the Data API documentation.
overview.description: With the API, you can access our data in a programmatic way via endpoints, without depending on BigQuery.
overview.descriptionPricing: Each endpoint has a different pricing tier, depending on the number of requests accumulated in the month.
overview.needForKeys: To use the API, you'll need an API key. The instructions on how to get one are available in the authentication section.
overview.earlyReleaseDescription: This is an early release version of our Data API. We are currently testing and improving our services. Some of the features may be unstable. More endpoints, features, and detailed documentation will be released in the future.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.getApiKeyBy: To access the API, you'll need an API key. To get one:
authentication.getApiKeyBy2Contactus: Contact us to request a key
authentication.weWillAnswerYou: We will answer you as soon as possible.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to use the Data API

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: To use the Data API, you'll need to add credits to your API key.
pricing.addCredits: To add credits to your API key:
pricing.step1: 1. Browse to your user area in the Data API section.
pricing.step2: 2. For your API key, click on the 'Add Credits' button.
pricing.step3: 3. Select the amount of credits you want to add and complete the payment.
pricing.note: Credits will be immediately available after successful payment.
